verses.padam: - Padam prajananamiti̍# pra-jananam|jyOti̍ḥ|agniḥ|dEvatA̍nAm|jyOti̍ḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|CandasAm|jyOti̍ḥ|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|vAcaḥ|agnau|samiti|tiṣṭhatE|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m|aBi|samiti|padyatE|tasmA̱t|tat|jyOti̍ḥ|ucyatE|dvau|stOmau̱|prAtassavanamiti̍# prAtaḥ - savanam|vahataḥ|yathA̱|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|ca|apAna ityapa̍ - anaḥ|ca|dvau|mAddhyandinam|sava̍nam|yathA̱|cakṣu̍ḥ|ca|śrOtra̱m|ca|dvau|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|yathA̱|vAk|ca|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|ca|puruṣasammita̍ iti puruṣa̍ - sammitaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñaḥ|asthUriḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajananaM̍ jyOtiragni-rdEvatA̍nAM̍ jyOtirvirAṭ̍ CandasAM̍ jyOtirvirAḍ̍ vAcO̱&gnau saM tiṣṭhatE̍ virAjamaBi̍ saMpadyatE̍ tasmAt tajjyOtirucyatE̍ dvau stOmau̱ prAtassavanaM ~MvahatO̍ yathA̱ prAṇaścA&pAnaśca̍ dvau mAddhyadiMnaṃq̍ savanaM̍ ~MyathA cakṣuśca̍ śrOtraM̍ ca dvau tRutIyasavanaM̍ ~MyathA vAk ca# pratiṣṭhA ca puruṣasaMmitO̍ vA Eṣa yajñO&sthUri̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam yam|kAma̱m|kAmayatE|tam|EtEna̍|aBIti̍|aśnutE|sarva̱m|hi|asthU̍riṇA|aByaśnuta̍ ityaBi̍ - aśnutE|agniṣṭOmEnEtyagni̍ - stOmEna|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|asRujata|tAḥ|agniṣṭOmEnEtyagni-stOmEna̍|Eva|parIti̍|agRuhṇAt|tAsA̱m|pari̍gRuhItAnAmiti̍ pari# - gRuhItAnAm|aśvataraḥ|atIti|apravata|tasya̍|anuhAyEtya̍nu̍ - hAya|rEta̍ḥ|Eti̍|adatta|tat|gardaBE|nIti̍|amArṭ|tasmA̱t|gardaBaḥ|dvirEtA̍ iti# dvi - rEtA̱ḥ|athO iti|Ahuḥ|vaḍa̍bAyAm|nIti̍|amArṭq|iti̍|tasmA̱t|vaḍa̍bA|dvirEtA̍ iti# dvi - rEtA̱ḥ|athO iti|Ahuḥ|Oṣa̍dhIṣu|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ryaM kAmaM̍ kAmayatE̍ tamEtEnAByaśnutE̍ sarvaṅq hyasthuriṇA&ByaśnutE̱̍ &gniṣṭOmEna vai prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tA agniṣṭOmEnaiva̍ paryagRuhṇAt̍ tAsAM parigRuhItAnA-maśvatarO&tya̍pravata̍ tasyAnuhAyarEta̍ A&datta̍ tad-gardaBE̍ nyamArṭ̍ tasmA̱d-gardaBO dvirEtA athO# AhurvaḍabAyAM̍ nyamArḍiti̍ tasmAd-vaḍabA̍ dvirEtA athO# AhurOṣadhIṣu̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam nIti|amArṭa|iti̍|tasmA̱t|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|ana̍ByaktA̍ ityanaBi̍ - aktAḥ|rEBanti|athO iti|Ahuḥ|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|nIti̍|amArṭq|iti̍|tasmA̱t|yamau|jAyEtE̍ iti|tasmA̱t|aśvataraḥ|na|prEti̍|jAyatE|Atta̍rEtA̍ ityAtta# - rEtAḥ|hi|tasmA̱t|barqḥiṣi|ana̍vaklRupta̍ ityanava̍ - klRuptaḥ|sarvavEdasa iti# sarva-vEdasE|vA|sahasrE̱|vA|avaklRupta̍ ityava-klRuptaḥ|atIti̍|hi|apra̍vata|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agniṣṭOmEnEtya̍gni-̍ stOmEna|yaja̍tE|prEti̍|ajA̍tAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|janayati|parIti̍|prajA̍tA̍ iti pra - jAtAḥ|gRuhṇAti|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|jyEṣṭhayajña iti# jyEṣṭha - yajñaḥ|iti|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nyamArḍiti̍ tasmAdOṣadhayO̍ &naByaktA̍ rEBantyathO# Ahuḥ prajAsu nyamArḍiti̍ tasmA̱d-yamau jAyEtE̍ tasmAdaśvatarO̍ na pra jAyata̍ AttarEtA̍ hi tasmA̱d barqḥiṣyanavaklRuptaḥ̍ sarvavEdasE vA# sahasrE vA&va# klRuptO&ti hyapravata̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniṣṭOmEna̍ yajatE̍ prAjAtAḥ̍ prajA janayati̍ pari prajAtA̍ gRuhṇAti tasmAdAhurjyEṣṭhayajña̍ iti# - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vAva|jyEṣṭhaḥ|saḥ|hi|EtEna̍|agrE̱|aya̍jata|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|prEti|jAyEya|iti̍|saḥ|muKataḥ|trivRutamiti̍# tri - vRuta̱m|niriti|amimIta|tam|agniḥ|dEvatA̱|anviti̍|asRujyata|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|sAma|brAhmaṇaḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|ajaḥ|paśUnAm|tasmA̱t|tE|muKyA̱ḥ|muKataḥ|hi|asRu̍jyanta|ura̍saḥ|bAhuByAmiti̍# bAhu - ByAm|pa~jcadaśamiti# pa~jca - daśam|niriti|amimIta|tam|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|anviti̍|asRujyata|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|bRuhat|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirvAva̍ jyEṣṭhaḥ sa hyEtEnAgrE&ya̍jata̍ prajApatirakAmayata̍ pra jAyEyEti̍ sa muKatastrivRutaM̍ niramimIta̍ tamagnirdEvatA &nvasRujyata̍ gAyatrI CandO# rathantaraṃ sAma# brAhmaṇO manuṣyA̍ṇAmajaḥ̍ paśUnAM̍ tasmAt tE muKyA# muKatO hyasRujyantOra̍sO̍ bAhuByA̱M pa~jcadaśaM niramimIta̍ tamindrO# dEvatA &nvasRujyata̍ triṣṭup CandO# bRuhath - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam sAma|rAjanya̍ḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|avi̍ḥ|paśUnAm|tasmA̱t|tE|vIryA̍vanta̍ iti# vIrya# - vantaḥ|vIryA̱t|hi|asRujyanta|maddhyataḥ|saptadaśamiti̍# sapta - daśam|niriti|amimIta|tam|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|anviti̍|asRujyanta|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|vairUpam|sAma̍|vaiśya̍ḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|gAva̍ḥ|paśUnAm|tasmA̱t|tE|AdyA̱ḥ|annadhAnAditya̍nna̍ - dhAnA̱t|hi|asRujyanta|tasmA̱t|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|anyEBya̍ḥ|BUyi̍ṣṭhAḥ|hi|dEvatA̱ḥ|anviti̍|asRu̍jyanta|pattaḥ|EkaviṃqśamityE̍ka̍ - viṃqśam|niriti|amimIta|tam|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sAma# rAjanyO# manuṣyAṇAmavi̍ḥ̍ paśUnAM tasmAt tE vIryAvantO̍ vIryA̱ddhyasRujyanta̍ maddhyataḥ saptadaśaM̍ niramimIta̍ taM ~MviśvE# dEvA dEvatA anvasRujyanta̍ jagatI̍ CandO# vai rUpaṃ sAma vaiśyO# manuṣyAṇAM̍ gAvaḥ̍ paśUnAM tasmAt ta AdyA# annadhAnAddhya sRujyanta̍ tasmAd-BUyAṃsO̍ &nyEByO BUyiṣṭhA̍ hi dEvatA anvasRujyanta̍ patta Ekaviṃq̍ śaM niramimIta̍ tamanuṣṭup̍ CandO - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam anviti|asRujyata|vairAjam|sAma̍|śUdraḥ|manuṣyA̍ṇAm|aśva̍ḥ|paśUnAm|tasmA̱t|tau|BUtasa~gkrAmiṇAviti̍# BUta - sa~gkrAmiṇau̱|aśvaḥ|ca|śUdraḥ|ca|tasmA̱t|śUdraḥ|yajñE|ana̍vaklRupta̍ ityanava̍ - klRuptaḥ|na|hi|dEvatA̱ḥ|anviti|asRu̍jyata|tasmA̱t|pAdau̱|upEti̍|jIvataḥ|pattaḥ|hi|asRu̍jyEtAm|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|trivRuditi# tri - vRut|ad^^rdhamAsA ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAḥ|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|asau|Adityaḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|Etasminn|vai|EtE|śritAḥ|Etasminn̍|prati̍ṣṭhitA̍ iti prati# - sthitAḥ ( )|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|Etasminn̍|Eva|śrayatE|Etasminn̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati||6̍ (59)
verses.samhita: &nvasRujyata̍ vairAjaṃ sAma# śUdrO manuṣyA̍ṇAmaśva̍ḥ̍ paśUnAM tasmAt tau BUtasaM̍ krAmiṇAvaśvaśca̍ śUdraśca tasmA̱cCUdrO yajñE&navaklRuptO̍ na hi dEvatA anvasRujyata̍ tasmAt pAdAvupa# jIvataḥ pattO hyasRujyEtAM̍ prAṇA vai trivRudarddhamAsAḥ̍ pa~jcadaśaḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ saptadaśastraya# imE lOkA asAvAditya̍ Ekaviṃqśa̍ Etasmin vA EtE śritA Etasmin pratiṣṭhitA̍ ( ) ya EvaM ~MvEdaitasminnEva̍ śrayata̍ Etasmin prati# tiṣṭhati||6

verses.padam: - Padam prAtassavana iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|vai|gAyatrEṇa|Canda̍sA|trivRuta̍ iti# tri - vRutE̱|stOmAya|jyOti̍ḥ|dadha̍t|Eti|trivRutEti̍# tri - vRutA̱|brahmavarcasEnEti# brahma - varcasEna|pa~jcadaśAyEti̍# pa~jca - daśAya|jyOti̍ḥ|dadha̍t|Eti|pa~jcadaśEnEti̍# pa~jca-daśEna|Oja̍sA|vIryE̍ṇa|saptadaśAyEti̍# sapta - daśAya|jyOti̍ḥ|dadha̍t|Eti|saptadaśEnEti̍# sapta - daśEna|prAjApatyEnEti̍# prAjA - patyEna|prajana̍nEnEti̍# pra - jananEna|EkaviṃqśAyEtyE̍ka̍ - viṃqśAya|jyOti̍ḥ|dadha̍t|Eti|stOma̍ḥ|Eva|tat|stOmA̍ya|jyOti̍ḥ|dadha̍t|Eti|athO̍ iti|stOmE̱|Eva|stOma̱m|aBi|prEti̍|nayati|yAva̍ntaḥ|vai|stOmA̱ḥ|tAva̍ntaḥ|kAmA̱ḥ|tAva̍ntaḥ|lOkAḥ̍ ( )|tAvanti|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|EtAva̍taḥ|Eva|stOmAn̍|EtAva̍taḥ|kAmAn̍|EtAva̍taḥ|lOkAn|EtAva̍nti|jyOtIṃ̍ṣi|avEti̍|rundhE||7̍ (63)
verses.samhita: prAtassavanE vai gAyatrEṇa̍ CandasA̍ trivRutE stOmAya̍ jyOtirdadhadEti̍ trivRutA̱ brahmavarcasEna# pa~jcadaśAya jyOtirdadhadEti̍ pa~jcadaśEnaujasA̍ vIryEṇa̍ saptadaśAya jyOtirdadhadEti̍ saptadaśEna# prAjApatyEna# prajananEnaikaviṃqśAya̍ jyOtirdadhadEti̍ stOma# Eva tath stOmAya̍ jyOtirdadhadEtyathO̍ stOma# Eva stOmamaBi̍ pra ṇayati̍ yAvantO̍ vai stOmAstAvantaḥ̍ kAmAstAvantO̍ lOkA ( ) -stAvanti̍ jyOtIṅṣyEtAva̍ta̍ Eva stOmAnEtAva̍taḥ̍ kAmAnEtAva̍tO̍ lOkAnEtAvanti̍ jyOtIṅqṣyava# rundhE||7

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|yajEta|yaḥ|agniṣṭOmEnEtya̍gni̍ - stOmEna|yaja̍mAnaḥ|atha̍|sarva̍stOmEnEti̍ sarva# - stOmEna|yajEta|iti̍|yasya̍|trivRutamiti̍# tri - vRuta̱m|antaryantItyantaḥ-yanti̍|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|tasya|antaḥ|yanti|prAṇEṣviti̍# pra - anEṣu|mE|apIti̍|asat|iti̍|Kalu̍|vai|yajñEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yajatE|yasya̍|pa~jcadaśamiti̍# pa~jca - daśam|antaryantItyantaḥ̍ - yanti|vIrya̱m|tasya̍|antaḥ|yanti|vIryE̱|mE|apIti̍|asat|iti̍|Kalu̍|vai|yajñEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yajatE|yasya̍|saptadaśamiti̍# sapta - daśam|antaryantItyantaḥ̍ - yanti|8̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvai yajEta̍ yO̱&gniṣṭOmEna yajamAnO&tha̍ sarvastOmEna̍ yajEtEti yasya# trivRutamantaryanti̍# prAṇAṅ-stasyAntaryanti̍ prAṇEṣu mE&pyasaditi̍ Kalu vai yajñEna yajamAnO̍ yajatE yasya# pa~jcadaśamantaryanti̍# vIryaM̍ tasyAntaryanti̍ vIryE# mE&pyasaditi̍ Kalu vai yajñEna yajamAnO̍ yajatE yasya# saptadaśa-mantaryanti̍# - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam prajAmiti# pra - jAm|tasya|antaḥ|yanti|prajAyAmiti̍# pra - jAyA̱m|mE|apIti|asat|iti̍|Kalu̍|vai|yajñEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yajatE|yasya̍|EkaviṃqśamityE̍ka̍ - viṃqśam|antaryantityantaḥ̍ - yanti|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|tasya|antaḥ|yanti|pratiṣṭhAyAmiti̍# prati - sthAyA̱m|mE|apIti|asat|iti̍|Kalu̍|vai|yajñEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yajatE|yasya̍|triṇavamiti̍# tri - navam|antaryantItyantaḥ̍ - yanti|RutUn|ca|tasya̍|nakṣatriyA̱m|ca|virAjamiti̍# vi-rAja̱m|antaḥ|yanti|Rutuṣu|mE|apIti̍|asat|nakṣatriyA̍yAm|ca|virAjIti̍# vi - rAji|iti̍|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajAM tasyAntaryanti̍ prajAyAM mE&pyasaditi̍ Kalu vai yajñEna yajamAnO̍ yajatE yasyaikaviṃqśama̍ntaryanti̍# pratiṣṭhAM tasyAntaryanti̍ pratiṣṭhAyAM mE&pyasaditi̍ Kalu vai yajñEna yajamAnO̍ yajatE yasya# triṇavamantaryantyRutUṅśca̍ tasya# nakṣatriyA̱M ca virAjamantarya̍ntyRutuṣu̍ mE&pyasannakṣatriyA̍yAM̍ ca virAjIti - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Kalu|vai|yajñEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yajatE|yasya̍|trayastriṃqśamiti̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśam|antaryantityantaḥ̍ - yanti|dEvatA̱ḥ|tasya̍|antaḥ|yanti|dEvatA̍su|mE|apIti̍|asat|iti̍|Kalu̍|vai|yajñEna̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|yajatE|yaḥ|vai|stOmA̍nAm|avamam|paramatA̱m|gacCa̍ntam|vEda̍|paramatA̱m|Eva|gacCati|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|vai|stOmAnAm|avamaḥ|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|paramaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|paramatA̱m|Eva|gacCati||10̍ (44) (saptadaśamantaryanti̍# - virAjIti - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: Kalu vai yajñEna yajamAnO̍ yajatE yasya# trayastriṃqśamantaryanti̍# dEvatAstasyAntaryanti̍ dEvatAsu̍ mE&pyasaditi̍ Kalu vai yajñEna yajamAnO̍ yajatE yO vai stOmAnAmavamaM̍ paramatAM̍ gacCantaM̍ ~MvEda# paramatAmEva̍ gacCati̍ trivRudvai stOmAnAmavamastrivRut̍ paramO̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# paramatAmEva̍ gacCati||10̍ (saptadaśamantaryanti̍# - virAjIti - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam a~ggirasaḥ|vai|satram|Asata|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|tEṣA̱m|haviṣmAn|ca|haviṣkRuditi̍# haviḥ - kRut|ca|ahIyEtAm|tau|akAmayEtAm|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|iyAva|iti|tau|Etam|dvirAtramiti̍# dvi - rAtram|apaśyatAm|tam|Eti|aharatAm|tEna̍|ayajEtAm|tata̍ḥ|vai|tau|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aitAm|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|dvirAtrEṇEti# dvi - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|lOkam|Eti|tau|aitA̱m|pUrvEṇa|ahnA̱|aga̍cCatAm|utta̍rEṇEtyut̍ - tarEṇa|11 (50)
verses.samhita: a~ggirasO̍ vai satramAsata̍ tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ tEṣAṃ# haviṣmAṅśca̍ haviṣkRuccA&hIyEtAM̍ tAvakAmayEtAṃ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamiyAvEti̍ tAvEtaM dvirAtrama̍paśyatAM̍ tamA&haratAM̍ tEnAyajEtAM̍ tatO vai tau suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaitAM̍ ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAn dvirAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ suvargamEva lOkamEti̍ tAvaitAM pUrvEṇAhnA &gacCatAmutta̍rEṇA̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam aBiplava ityaBi̍ - plavaḥ|pUrva̱m|ahaḥ|Bavati|gati̍ḥ|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|jyOtiṣṭOma̍ iti jyOti# - stOmaḥ|agniṣṭOma ityagni-stOmaḥ|pUrva̱m|aha̍ḥ|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|tEna̍|avEti̍|rundhE|sarva̍stOma̍ iti sarva-stOmaḥ|atirAtra̍ ityati-rAtraḥ|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|sarvasya|Aptyai̱|sarva̍sya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|gAyatram|pUrvE̱|ahann|sAma̍|Bavati|tEja̍ḥ|vai|gAyatrI|gAyatrI|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|tEjaḥ|Eva|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|Atmann|dhattE|traiṣṭuBam|utta̍ra̍ ityut - tarE|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|triṣṭuk|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|Atmann|dhattE|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|pUrvE̱|12 (50)
verses.samhita: -Biplavaḥ pUrvamaharBavati̍ gatiruttaraM̍ jyOtiṣṭOmO&gniṣṭOmaḥ̍ pUrvamaharBavati̍ tEjastEnAva# rundhE sarvastOmO&tirAtra̍ uttaraṃq̍ sarvasyA&&*ptyai sarvasyA&varuddhyai̍ gAyatraM pUrvE&hanthsAma# Bavati tEjO vai gAyatrI̍ gAyatrI̍ brahmavarcasaM̍ tEja# Eva brahmavarcasamAtman̍ dhattE̍ traiṣṭuBamutta̍ra̍ OjO vai vIryaM̍ triṣṭugOja# Eva vIryamAtman̍ dhattE̍ rathaMtaraM pUrvE# - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam ahann|sAma̍|Bavati|iyam|vai|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM - taram|asyAm|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|bRuhat|utta̍ra̍ ityut - tarE|asau|vai|bRuhat|amuṣyA̱m|Eva|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|tat|Ahuḥ|kva̍|jaga̍tI|ca|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|ca|iti|vaiKAnasam|pUrvE̱|ahann̍|sAma̍|Bavati|tEna̍|jaga̍tyai|na|Eti|ṣOḍaśi|utta̍ra̍ ityut - tarE|tEna|anuṣṭuBa̍ ityanu̍ - stuBaḥ|atha̍|Ahuḥ|yat|samAnE|ad^^rdhamAsa̍ ityad^^rdha̍ - mAsE|syAtA̱m|anyatarasya|ahna̍ḥ|vIrya̱m|anviti̍# ( )|padyEta|iti|amAvAsyA̍yAmitya̍mA̍ - vAsyAyAm|pUrva̱m|aha̍ḥ|Bavati|utta̍rasminnityut̍ - tarasminn|uttaramityut̍ - taram|nAnA̱|Eva|ad^^rdhamAsayOrityad^^rdha̍ - mAsayO̱ḥ|Bavataḥ|nAnAvIryE̍ iti nAnA̱ - vIryE|Bavataḥ|haviṣmannidhanamiti̍# haviṣmat̍ - nidhanam|pUrva̱m|ahaḥ|Bavati|haviṣkRunni̍dhanamiti̍# haviṣkRut - nidhanam|uttaramityut̍ - taram|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai||13 (71) (uttarEṇa̍ - rathantaraM pUrvE - &nvE - kaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: &hanth sAma# BavatIyaM ~Mvai rathantaramasyAmEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhati bRuhaduttarE&sau̍ vai bRuhadamuṣyAmEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhati tadAhuḥ̍ kva# jagatI̍ cA&nuṣṭup cEti# vaiKAnasaM pUrvE&hanth sAma# Bavati tEna jagatyai̍ naiti# ṣOḍaśyuttarE̍ tEnAnuṣṭuBO&thA̍# &&*huryath samAnE̱&rddhamAsE̍ syAtA-manyatarasyAhnO̍# vIryamanu̍# ( ) padyEtEtya-mAvAsyA̍yAM̍ pUrvamaha-rBavatyutta̍rasmi-nnutta̍raM̍ nAnaivA &rddhamAsayO̱rBavatO̍ nAnAvIryE̍ BavatO haviṣmannidhanaM̍ pUrvamaharBavati̍ haviṣkRunnidhana-mutta̍raM̍ pratiṣṭhityai||13̍ (uttarEṇa̍ - rathantaraM pUrvE - &nvE - kaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Apaḥ|vai|idam|agrE̱|salilam|AsIt|tasminn̍|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vAyuḥ|BUtvA|acarat|saḥ|imAm|apaśyat|tAm|varAhaḥ|BUtvA|Eti|aharat|tAm|viśvakarmEti̍# viśva-karmA|BUtvA|vIti|amArṭq|sA|aprathata|sA|pRuthivI|aBavat|tat|pRuthivyai|pRuthivitvamiti̍# pRuthivi - tvam|tasyA̱m|aśrAmyat|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|saḥ|dEvAn|asRujata|vasUn|rudrAn|AdityAn|tE|dEvAḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|abruvann|prEti|jAyAmahai|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ApO vA idamagrE# salilamAsIt̍ tasmin̍ prajApati-rvAyurBUtvA̍ &carath̍ sa imAmapaśyat̍ tAM ~MvarAhO̍ BUtvA&harat̍ tAM ~MviśvakarmA̍ BUtvA vyamAṭrth̍ sA&prathata̍ sA pRuthivya̍Bavat̍ tat pRuthivyai̍ pRuthivitvaM̍ tasyAmaśrAmyat̍ prajApatiḥ̍ sa dEvAnasRujata̍ vasU̱n rudrAnAdityAn̍ tE dEvAḥ prajApatimabruvan̍ prajAyAmahA̍ iti sO̱&bravId - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam yathA̱|aham|yuṣmAn|tapasA|asRu̍kṣi|Evam|tapa̍si|prajana̍namiti̍# pra - jananam|icCaddhvam|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|agnim|Ayata̍namityA̱̍ - yatanam|prEti̍|ayacCat|EtEna̍|Ayata̍nEnEtyA̱̍ - yatanEna|śrAmyata|iti̍|tE|agninA̱|Ayata̍nEnEtyA̱̍ - yatanEna|aśrAmyann|tE|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|EkA̱m|gAm|asRujanta|tAm|vasuBya̍ iti vasu# - Byaḥ|rudrEByaḥ|AdityEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ayacCann|EtAm|rakṣaddhvam|iti̍|tAm|vasa̍vaḥ|rudrAḥ|AdityAḥ|arakṣanta|sA|vasu̍Bya̍ iti vasu# - Byaḥ|rudrEByaḥ|AdityEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ajAyata|trIṇi̍|ca|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -yathA&haM ~MyuṣmAṅstapasA &sRukṣyEvaM̍ tapasi̍ prajanana-micCaddhvamiti̍ tEByO&gnimAyatanaM̍ prA&yacCadEtEnA&&*yata̍nEna̍ śrAmyatEti tE̱&gninA&&*yatanEnA&-śrAmyan̍ tE saM~Mvathsara̍ EkAM gAmasRujanta̍ tAM ~MvasuByO̍ rudrEBya# AdityEByaḥ prA&yacCannEtAṃ̍ rakṣaddhvamiti̍ tAM ~MvasavO̍ rudrA AdityA̍ arakṣanta̍ sA vasuByO̍ rudrEBya# AdityEByaḥ prAjAyata̍ trIṇi# ca - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam śatAni|traya̍striṃśatamiti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatam|ca|atha|sA|Eva|sahasratamIti̍# sahasra - tamI|aBavat|tE|dEvAḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|abruvann|sahasrEṇa|naḥ|yAjaya|iti̍|saḥ|agniṣṭOmEnEtya̍gni-stOmEna̍|vasUn̍|ayAjayat|tE|imam|lOkam|ajayann|tat|ca|adaduḥ|saḥ|ukthyE̍na|rudrAn|ayAjayat|tE|antari̍kṣam|ajayann|tat|ca|adaduḥ|saḥ|atirAtrEṇEtya̍ti̍ - rAtrEṇa|AdityAn|ayAjayat|tE|amum|lOkam|ajayann|tat|ca|adaduḥ|tat|antari̍kṣam|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śatAni trayastriṃśataM̍ cAtha saiva sahasratamya̍Bavat̍ tE dEvAḥ prajApatimabruvanth̍ sahasrEṇa̍ nO yAjayEti sO̱&gniṣṭOmEna vasUnayAjayat̍ ta imaM ~MlOkamajayan̍ taccAdaduḥ̍ sa ukthyEna̍ rudrAnayAjayat̍ tE̱&ntarikṣamajayan̍ taccAdaduḥ̍ sO&tirAtrEṇA̍&&*dityAna̍yAjayat̍ tE&muM̍ ~MlOkamajayan̍ taccAdadu̍ -stadantarikṣaM̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam vyavai̱ryatEti# vi - avai̱ryata|tasmA̱t|rudrAḥ|GAtukAḥ|anAyatanA̍ ityanA̍ - yatanAḥ|hi|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|śithilam|vai|maddhyamam|ahaḥ|trirAtrasyEti̍# tri - rAtrasya|vIti̍|hi|tat|avairyatEtya̍va̍ - airyata|iti̍|traiṣṭu̍Bam|maddhyamasya̍|ahna̍ḥ|Ajya̱m|Bavati|saM~MyAnAniti̍# sam - yAnAni|sUktAnIti̍# su - uktAni|śaṃqsati|ṣOḍaśina̱m|śaṃqsati|ahna̍ḥ|dhRutyai̱|aśi̍thilamBAvAyEtyaśi̍thilaM̍ - BAvAya|tasmA̱t|trirAtrasyEti# tri - rAtrasya|agniṣṭOma̍ ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|Eva|prathamam|ahaḥ|syAt|atha̍|ukthya̍ḥ|atha̍|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|trIṇitrIṇIti̍ trIṇi# - trIṇi|śatAni|anUcInAhamitya̍nUcIna̍ - aham|avyavacCinnAnItyavi̍# - avacCinnAni|dadAti|17 (50)
verses.samhita: ~Mvyavai̱ryata tasmA̱d-rudrA GAtukA̍ anAyatanA hi tasmAdAhuḥ̍ śithilaM ~Mvai maddhyama-maha̍strirAtrasya̍ vi hi tadavairyatEti traiṣṭuBaM̍ maddhyamasyAhna AjyaM̍ Bavati saM~MyAnAni̍ sUktAni# śaṃsati ṣOḍaśinaṃ# śaṃsatyahnO dhRutyA aśithilaMBAvAya̍ tasmA̱t trirAtrasyA̱gniṣṭOma Eva prathamamaha̍ḥ̍ syAdathOkthyO &thA&tirAtra̍ EṣAM ~MlOkAnAM ~MvidhRutyai̍ trIṇitrIṇi̍ śatA-nyanUcInAha-mavya̍vacCinnAni̍ dadA - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|anviti|santa̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|daśata̱m|na|vIti|CindyAt|virAjamiti̍# vi - rAja̱m|na|it|vicCinadAnIti# vi - CinadAni|iti̍|atha̍|yA|sahasratamIti̍# sahasra - tamI|AsI̱t|tasyA̱m|indraḥ|ca|viṣṇu̍ḥ|ca|vyAya̍cCEtAmiti̍# vi - AyacCEtAm|saḥ|indra̍ḥ|amanyata|anayA̱|vai|idam|viṣṇu̍ḥ|sahasra̱m|varkṣyatE|iti̍|tasyA̱m|akalpEtAm|dviBA̍ga̍ iti dvi - BAgE|indraḥ|tRutI̍yE|viṣṇu̍ḥ|tat|vai|EṣA|aByanU̱cyata̍ ityaBi-anU̱cyatE|uBA|jigyathuḥ|iti̍|tAm|vai|EtAm|acCAvAkaḥ|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyEṣAM ~MlOkAnAmanu santatyai̍ daśataM na vicCindyAd-virAjaM̍ nEdvicCinadAnItyatha̍ yA sahasratamyAsIt̍ tasyAmindraśca̍ viṣṇuśca̍ vyAyacCEtAṃq̍ sa indrO&manyatAnayA̍ vA idaM ~Mviṣṇuḥ̍ sahasraM̍ ~Mvarkṣyata iti tasyAmakalpEtAM̍ dviBAga̍ indrastRutIyE̍ viṣṇustadvA EṣA&ByanU̱cyata uBA jigyathuriti̍ tAM ~MvA EtAmacCAvAka̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|śaṃqsati|atha|yA|sahasratamIti̍# sahasra - tamI|sA|hOtrE̱|dEyA̱|iti|hOtA̍ram|vai|aByati̍ricyata̍ ityaBi-ati̍ricyatE|yat|atiricya̍ta̍ ityati̍ - ricyatE|hOtA̱|anA̱ptasya|ApayitA|atha̍|Ahuḥ|unnEtra̍ ityut̍ - nEtrE|dEyA̱|iti|ati̍riktEtyati̍# - riktA|vai|EṣA|sahasrasya|ati̍rikta̍ ityati# - riktaḥ|unnEtEtyut̍ - nEtA|RutvijA̱m|atha|Ahuḥ|sarvE̱Byaḥ|sadasyE̱Byaḥ|dEyA̱|iti̍|atha̍|Ahuḥ|udAkRutyEtyu̍t̍ - AkRutyA̱|sA|vaśa̱m|carEt|iti|atha̍|Ahuḥ|brahmaṇE̱|ca|agnIdha̍ ityagni̍ - idhE̱|ca|dEyA̱|iti|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Eva śaṃsatyatha̍ yA sahasratamI̍ sA hOtrE dEyEti hOtAraM̍ ~MvA aByatiricyatE̍ yadatiricya̍tE̍ hOtA &nA̱ptasyA&&*payitA &thA&*hurunnEtrE̍ dEyEtyatiriktA̍ vA EṣA sahasrasyAtirikta̍ unnEtartvijAmathA&&*huḥ̍ sarvE̱Byaḥ sadasyE̱ByO dEyEtyathA&&hurudA̍ kRutyA sA vaśaM̍ carEdityathA&&*hurbrahmaṇE̍# cAgnIdhE# ca dEyEti - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam dviBAgamiti̍ dvi - BAgam|brahmaṇE̱|tRutIyam|agnIdha̍ ityagni-̍ idhE̱|aindraḥ|vai|brahmA|vaiṣṇavaḥ|agnIdityagni-it|yathA̱|Eva|tau|aka̍lpEtAm|iti̍|atha̍|Ahuḥ|yA|kalyAṇI|bahurUpEti̍# bahu - rUpA|sA|dEyA̱|iti|atha̍|Ahuḥ|yA|dvirUpEti̍# dvi - rUpA|uBayataEnItya̍Bayata̍ḥ̍ - EnI|sA|dEyA̱|iti|sahasra̍sya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari-gRuhItyai|tat|vai|Etat|sahasra̍sya|aya̍nam|sahasra̱m|stOtrIyA̱ḥ|sahasra̱m|dakṣi̍ṇAḥ|sahasra̍saMmita̍ iti# sahasra# - samiMqtaḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|suvargasyEti# suvaḥ - gasya|lOkasya̍|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai||20 (47) (abravI - cca - tadantarikṣaM̍ - dadAtya - cCAvAka - śca dEyEti# - saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: dviBAgaM̍ brahmaṇE tRutIyamagnIdha̍# aindrO vai brahmA vai̱ṣṇavO̱&gnIdyathaiva tAvakalpEtAmityathA̍# &&*huryA kalyAṇI̍ bahurUpA̍ sA dEyEtyathA# &&*huryA dvirUpOBayata̍EnI̍ sA dEyEti# sahasrasya̍ parigRuhItyai̍ tadvA Etath sahasrasyA&yanaṃ̍ sahasraṅ# stOtrIyA̱ḥ sahasraM dakṣiṇAḥ̍ sahasrasammitaḥ̍ suvargO lOkaḥ suvargasya̍# lOkasyABijityai||20̍ (abravI - cca - tadantarikṣaM̍ - dadAtya - cCAvAka - śca dEyEti# - saptacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sOmaḥ|vai|sahasra̱m|avindat|tam|indra̍ḥ|anviti̍|anvindat|tau|yamaḥ|nyAga̍cCaditi̍# ni - AgacCat|tau|abravIt|astu̍|mE|atra̍|apIti̍|iti̍|astu̍|hI(3)|iti̍|abrUtAm|saḥ|yamaḥ|Eka̍syAm|vIrya̱m|parIti̍|apaśyat|iyam|vai|asya|sahasra̍sya|vIrya̱m|biBarti|iti̍|tau|abravIt|iyam|mama̍|astu̍|Etat|yuvayO̱ḥ|iti̍|tau|abrUtAm|sarvE̱|vai|Etat|EtasyA̱m|vIrya̱m|21̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmO vai sahasramavindat̍ tamindrO &nvavindat̍ tau yamO nyAgacCat̍ tAvabravIdastu̍ mE&trA&pItyastu hI(3) ityabrUtAṃq̍ sa yama EkasyAM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ paryapaśyadiyaM̍ ~MvA asya sahasrasya̍ vIryaM̍ biBartIti tAvabravIdiyaM̍ mamAstvEtad-yuvayOriti tAvabrUtAṃq̍ sarvE vA EtadEtasyA̱M ~MvIryaM̍ - [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam parIti|paśyAmaḥ|aṃśa̱m|Eti̍|harAmahai|iti̍|tasyA̱m|aṃśa̱m|Eti̍|aharanta|tAm|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|prEti|avEśayann|sOmA̍ya|udEhItyu̍t̍ - Ehi|iti̍|sA|rOhi̍ṇI|pi~ggalA|Eka̍hAyanItyEka̍# - hAyanI|rUpam|kRutvA|trayastriṃśatEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatA|ca|triBiriti# tri - Biḥ|ca|śataiḥ|saha|udaidityut̍ - ait|tasmA̱t|rOhiṇyA|pi~ggalayA̱|Eka̍hAyanyEtyEka̍# - hAyanyA|sOma̱m|krIṇIyAt|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|rOhiṇyA|pi~ggalayA̱|Eka̍hAyanyEtyEka̍# - hAyanyA|sOma̱m|krIṇAti|traya̍striṃśatEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatA|ca|Eva|asya|triBiriti# tri - Biḥ|ca|22 (50)
verses.samhita: pari# paśyAmO&ṃśamA harAmahA̍ iti tasyAmaṃśamA&haranta̍ tAmaPsu prA&vEśayanth̍ sOmAyOdEhIti̍ sA rOhiṇI̍ pi~ggalaikahAyanI̍ rUpaM kRutvA trayastriṃśatA̍ ca triBiśca# śataiḥ sahOdait tasmAd-rOhiṇyA̍ pi~ggalayaikahAyanyA̍ sOmaM̍ krIṇIyAdya EvaM ~MvidvAn rOhiṇyA̍ pi~ggalayaikahAyanyA̍ sOmaM̍ krIṇAti trayastriṃśatA̍ caivAsya# triBiśca# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam śataiḥ|sOmaḥ|krItaḥ|Bavati|sukrI̍tEnEti̍ su-krItEna|yajatE|tAm|aPsvityap̍ - su|prEti|avEśayann|indrA̍ya|udEhItyu̍t̍ - Ehi|iti̍|sA|rOhi̍ṇI|lakṣmaṇA|paṣṭhauhI|vArtraGnIti̍ vArtra# - GnI|rUpam|kRutvA|trayastriṃśatEti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatA|ca|triBiriti# tri - Biḥ|ca|śataiḥ|saha|udaidityut̍ - ait|tasmA̱t|rOhiṇIm|lakṣmaṇAm|paṣṭhauhIm|vArtra̍GnImiti̍ vArtra# - GnIm|dadyAt|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|rOhiṇIm|lakṣmaṇAm|paṣṭhauhIm|vArtra̍GnImiti̍ vArtra# - GnIm|dadAti|traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|ca|Eva|asya|trIṇi|ca|śatAni̍|sA|dattA|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: śataiḥ sOmaḥ̍ krItO Bavati̍ sukrItEna̍ yajatE tAmaPsu prAvEśaya-nnindrA̍yOdEhIti̍ sA rOhiṇI̍ lakṣmaṇA paṣṭhauhI̍ vArtraGnI̍ rUpaM kRutvA trayastriṃśatA̍ ca triBiśca# śataiḥ sahOdait tasmAd rOhiṇIM̍ ~MlakṣmaṇAM paṣṭhauhIM̍ ~MvArtraGnIM̍ dadyAdya EvaM ~MvidvAn rOhiṇIM̍ ~MlakṣmaṇAM paṣṭhauhIM̍ ~MvArtraGnIM̍ dadAti̍ trayastriṃśaccaivAsya̍ trIṇi# ca śatAni sA dattA - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|tAm|aPsvityap̍ - su|prEti|avEśayann|yamAya̍|udEhItyu̍t̍ - Ehi|iti̍|sA|jara̍tI|mUrKA|tajjaGanyEti̍# tat - jaGanyA|rUpam|kRutvA|trayastriṃśatEti̍ trayaḥ-triṃqśatA|ca|triBiriti̍# tri - Biḥ|ca|śataiḥ|saha|udaidityut̍ - ait|tasmA̱t|jaratIm|mUrKAm|tajjaGanyAmiti̍# tat - jaGanyAm|anustaraṇImitya̍nu̍ - staraṇIm|kurvIta|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|jara̍tIm|mUrKAm|tajjaGanyAmiti̍# tat - jaGanyAm|anustaraṇImityu̍nu̍ - staraṇIm|kurutE|traya̍striṃśaditi̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśat|ca|Eva|asya|trIṇi|ca|śatAni̍|sA|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Bavati|vAk|Eva|sahasratamIti̍# sahasra - tamI|tasmA̱t|24 (50)
verses.samhita: Bavati̍ tAmaPsu prAvEśayan̍ yamAyOdEhIti sA jaratI̍ mUrKA tajjaGanyA̍ rUpaM kRutvA trayastriṃśatA̍ ca triBiśca# śataiḥ sahOdait tasmAjjaratIM̍ mUrKAM tajjaGanyA-ma̍nustara̍ṇIM̍ kurvIta ya EvaM ~MvidvA~jjaratIM̍ mUrKAM tajjaGanyA-ma̍nustara̍ṇIM̍ kurutE trayastriṃśaccaivAsya̍ trIṇi# ca śatAni sA&muṣmi~MllOkE̍ Bavati̍ vAgEva sahasratamI̍ tasmA - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam varaḥ|dEya̍ḥ|sA|hi|vara̍ḥ|sahasra̱m|asya|sA|dattA|Bavati|tasmA̱t|vara̍ḥ|na|pratigRuhya̍ iti# prati - gRuhyaḥ|sA|hi|vara̍ḥ|sahasra̱m|asya|prati̍gRuhItamiti̍ prati# - gRuhItam|Bavati|iyam|varaḥ|iti̍|brUyAt|atha̍|anyAm|brUyAt|iyam|mama̍|iti̍|tathA̱|asya|tat|sahasra̱m|apra̍tigRuhItamityapra̍ti̍ - gRuhItam|Bavati|uBayataEnItyuBayataḥ̍ - EnI|syAt|tat|Ahuḥ|anyataEnItyanyataḥ̍ - EnI|syAt|sahasra̱m|parastA̱t|Eta̱m|iti|yA|Eva|vara̍ḥ|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvarO dEyaḥ sA hi varaḥ̍ sahasramasya̍ sA dattA Bavati̍ tasmAd varO na pratigRuhyaḥ̍ sA hi varaḥ̍ sahasramasya̍ pratigRuhItaM̍ BavatIyaM ~Mvara iti# brUyAdathAnyAM brUyAdiyaM̍ mamEti tathA̱&sya tath sahasra-mapratigRuhItaM̍ BavatyuBayataEnI syAt tadAhuranyata̍ EnI syA̱th sahasraM̍ parastAdEtamiti yaiva varaḥ̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam kalyAṇI|rUpasamRuddhEti̍# rUpa - samRuddhA|sA|syAt|sA|hi|varaḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|tAm|uttarEṇEtyut̍ - tarEṇa|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni# - iddhram|paryAṇIyEti# pari - AnIya|AhavanIyasyEtyA̱̍ - havanIyasya|antE̱|drOṇakalaśamiti̍# drOṇa - kalaśam|avEti|GrApayEt|Eti̍|jiGra|kalaśa̱m|mahi|urudhArEtyuru̍ - dhArA|payasvatI|Eti̍|tvA|viśantu|inda̍vaḥ|samudram|iva|sindha̍vaḥ|sA|mA|sahasrE̱|Eti̍|Baja|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu-Biḥ|saha|punaḥ|mA|Eti̍|viśatAt|rayiḥ|iti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|rayyA|samiti|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kalyAṇI rUpasamRuddhA̍ sA syAth sA hi varaḥ samRuddhyai̍ tAmuttarEṇA&&*gnI̱ddhraM̍ paryAṇIyA&&*havanIyasyAntE̱̍ drOṇakalaśamava# GrApayEdA jiGra̍ kalaśaM̍ mahyurudhArA̍ payasvatyA̍ tvA# viśantvindavaḥ̍ samudramiva̍ sindhavaḥ̍ sA mA# sahasra A Baja̍ prajayA# paśuBiḥ̍ saha punarmA &&*viśatAd-rayiriti̍# prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBI# rayyA sa - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam ad^^rdhayati|prajAvAniti# prajA - vAn|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|rayimAniti# rayi - mAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|tayA̱|saha|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni̍# - iddhram|parEtyEti# parA - itya|purastA̱t|pratIcyA̱m|tiṣṭha̍ntyAm|juhuyAt|uBA|jigyathuḥ|na|parEti̍|jayEthE̍ iti|na|parEti̍|jigyE|kataraḥ|cana|EnOḥ||indra̍ḥ|ca|viṣṇO̍ iti|yat|apa̍spRudhEthAm|trEdhA|sahasra̱m|vIti̍|tat|airayEthAm|iti̍|trEdhAviBaktamiti̍# trEdhA - viBaktam|vai|trirAtra iti# tri - rAtrE|sahasra̱m|sAhasrIm|Eva|EnAm|karOti|sahasrasya|Eva|EnAm|mAtrA̱m|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -marddhayati̍ prajAvA̱n paśumAn rayimAn̍ Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda tayA# sahA&&*gnI̱ddhraM parEtya# purastA̱t pratIcyAM tiṣṭhantyAM̍ juhuyAduBA jigyathurna̍ parA# jayEthE na parA# jigyE kataraścanainO̱ḥ|indraśca̍ viṣṇO yadapaspRudhEthAM̍ trEdhA sahasraM ~Mvi tadairayEthAmiti̍,̍ trEdhAviBaktaM ~Mvai trirAtrE̍ sahasraṃ# sAhasrImEvainA̱M karOti sahasrasyaivainAM̍ mAtrA̱M - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam karOti|rUpAṇi|juhOti|rUpaiḥ|Eva|EnAm|samiti̍|ad^^rdhayati|tasyA̱ḥ|upOtthAyEtyu̍pa̍ - utthAya|karṇa̱m|Eti̍|japEt|iḍE̱|rantE̱|adi̍tE|sara̍svati|priyE̱|prEya̍si|mahi̍|viśrutIti̍ vi - śruti|EtAni|tE|aGniyE|nAmA̍ni|sukRutamiti̍# su - kRuta̱m|mA|dEvEṣu|brUtAt|iti̍|dEvEBya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|Eti̍|vEdayati|anviti̍|Enam|dEvAḥ|buddhyantE||28̍ (39) ( EtadEtasyA̱M ~MvIrya# - masya triBiśca# - dattA - sahasratamI̍ tasmA# - dEva varaḥ - saM - mAtrA - mEkAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: karOti rUpAṇi# juhOti rUpairEvainAṃq samarddhayati̍ tasyA# upOtthAya karṇamA japEdiḍE̍ rantE&ditE̍ sarasvati̍ priyE prEyasi̍ mahi viśrutyEtAni̍# tE aGniyE nAmAni̍ sukRutaM̍ mA dEvEṣu# brUtAditi# dEvEBya# EvainamA vEdayatyanvE̍naM̍ dEvA buddhyantE||28̍ ( EtadEtasyA̱M ~MvIrya# - masya triBiśca# - dattA - sahasratamI̍ tasmA# - dEva varaḥ - saM - mAtrA - mEkAnnacatvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sahasratamyEti# sahasra - tamyA̱|vai|yajamAnaḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|sA|Enam|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamayati|sA|mA|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|gamaya|iti|Aha|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|sA|mA|jyOtiṣmantam|lOkam|gamaya|iti̍|Aha|jyOti̍ṣmantam|Eva|Enam|lOkam|gamayati|sA|mA|sarvAn̍|puṇyAn̍|lOkAn|gamaya|iti̍|Aha|sarvAn̍|Eva|Enam|puṇyAn̍|lOkAn|gamayati|sA|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sahasratamyA# vai yajamAnaḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamEti̍ sainaṃ# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ sA mA# suvargaM ~MlOkaM gamayEtyA̍ha̍ suvargamEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ sA mA jyOtiṣmantaM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayEtyA̍ha̍ jyOtiṣmantamEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkaM gamayati̍ sA mA sarvAn puṇyA̱M ~MlOkAn gamayEtyA̍ha̍ sarvAnEvainaM̍ puṇyA̱M ~MlOkAn gamayati̍ sA - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam mA|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|gamaya|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|saha|punaḥ|mA|Eti̍|viśatAt|rayiḥ|iti̍|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|Eva|Enam|paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|rayyAm|pratIti|sthApayati|prajAvAniti̍# prajA - vAn|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|rayimAniti# rayi - mAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|tAm|agnIdha̍ ityagni̍ - idhE̱|vA|brahmaṇE̱|vA|hOtrE̱|vA|udgAtra ityut̍ - gAtrE|vA|addhvaryavE̱|vA|dadyAt|sahasra̱m|asya|sA|dattA|Bavati|sahasra̱m|asya|pratigRuhItamiti̍ prati# - gRuhItam|Bavati|yaḥ|tAm|avidvAn|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mA̱ pratiṣṭhAM gamaya̍ prajayA# paśuBiḥ̍ saha punarmA&& viśatAd-rayiriti̍# prajayaivainaM̍ paśuBI# rayyAM prati# ṣṭhApayati prajAvA̱n paśumAn rayimAn̍ Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda tAmagnIdhE# vA brahmaṇE# vA hOtrE# vOdgAtrE vA̱&ddhvaryavE# vA dadyAth sahasramasya̍ sA dattA Bavati̍ sahasramasya̍ pratigRuhItaM̍ Bavati yastAmavidvAn̍ - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam pratigRuhṇAtIti# prati - gRuhṇAti|tAm|pratIti̍|gRuhṇIyAt|EkA̱|asi|na|sahasra̱m|EkA̱m|tvA|BUtAm|pratIti̍|gRuhṇAmi|na|sahasra̱m|EkA̱|mA|BUtA|Eti̍|viśa|mA|sahasra̱m|iti̍|EkA̱m|Eva|EnAm|BUtAm|pratIti̍|gRuhṇAti|na|sahasra̱m|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|syOnA|asi|suṣadEti̍# su-sadA̱|suśEvEti# su - śEvA̱|syOnA|mA|Eti|viśa|suṣadEti̍# su - sadA̱|mA|Eti|viśa|suśEvEti̍# su - śEvA̱|mA|Eti|viśa|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pratigRuhṇAti tAM pratigRuhṇIyAdEkA̍&si̍ na sahasramEkA̱M tvA BUtAM prati# gRuhṇAmi na sahasramEkA# mA BUtA&& viśa̍ mA sahasramityEkAmEvainA̱M̍ BUtAM pratigRuhṇAti̍ na sahasraM ~Mya EvaM ~MvEda# syOnA&si# suṣadA# suśEvA̱ syOnA mA &&viśa̍ suṣadA mA &&viśa̍ suśEvA mA &&viśE -[ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|syOnA|Eva|Enam|suṣadEti̍# su - sadA̱|suśEvEti# su - śEvA̱|BUtA|Eti|viśati|na|Enam|hinasti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|sahasra̱m|sahasratamIti̍# sahasra - tamI|anviti|EtI(3)|sahasratamImiti̍# sahasra - tamIm|sahasrA(3)m|iti|yat|prAcI̱m|uthsRujEdityu̍t̍ - sRujEt|sahasra̱m|sahasratamIti# sahasra - tamI|anviti|iyAt|tat|sahasra̱m|aprajñAtramitya̍pra̍ - jñAtram|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|na|prEti|jAnIyAt|pratIcI̱m|uditi̍|sRujati|tAm|sahasra̱m|anviti̍|paryAva̍rtata̍ iti# pari - AvartatE|sA|prajAnatIti̍# pra - jAnatI|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|yajamAnam̍ ( )|aBi|uditi|sRujati|kṣiprE|sahasra̱m|prEti̍|jAyatE|uttamEtyu̍t̍ - tamA|nIyatE̱|prathamA|dEvAn|gacCati||32 (62)
verses.samhita: -tyAha̍ syOnaivainaṃ# suṣadA# suśEvA# BUtA&& viśati̍ nainaṃ# hinasti brahmavAdinO# vadanti sahasraṃ# sahasratamyanvEtI(3) sahasratamIṃ̍ sahasrA(3)miti yat prAcImuth̍ sRujEth sahasraṃ# sahasratamyanviyAt̍ tath sahasramaprajñAtraṃ̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM na pra jAnIyAt̍ pratIcImuth- sRujati̍ tAṃ sahasramanu# paryAvartatE̍ sA prajAnatI̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti̍ yajamAna̍ ( ) -maByuth sRujati̍ kṣiprE sahasraM pra jAyata̍ uttamA nIyatE̱ prathamA dEvAn gacCati||32̍

verses.padam: - Padam atriḥ|adadAt|aurvA̍ya|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|putrakAmAyEti̍# putra - kAmAya|saḥ|riricAnaḥ|amanyata|nirvI̱rya iti niḥ - vIryaḥ|śithilaḥ|yAtayAmEti# yAta - yAmA|saḥ|Etam|catUrAtramiti# catuḥ - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|tasya̍|catvAra̍ḥ|vIrAḥ|Eti̍|ajAyanta|suhOtEti̍ su - hOtA|sU̱dgAtEti su - udgAtA|svaddhvaryuriti̍ su - addhvaryuḥ|susaBEya̍ iti su - saBEyaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|catUrAtrEṇEti# catuḥ - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|Eti̍|asya|catvAra̍ḥ|vIrAḥ|jAyantE|suhOtEti̍ su - hOtA|sU̱dgAtEti su - udgAtA|svaddhvaryuriti̍ su - addhvaryuḥ|susaBEya̍ iti su - saBEyaḥ|yE|caturviṃqśA iti# catuḥ - viṃqśAḥ|pavamAnAḥ|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|tat|33 (50)
verses.samhita: atriradadAdaurvA̍ya̍ prajAM putrakAmAya̍ sa riricAnO̍&manyata̍ nirvI̱ryaḥ śithilO yAtayAmA̍ sa EtaM catUrAtra-ma̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai tasya# catvArO# vIrA A&jAyanta̍ suhOtA̍ sU̱dgAtA svaddhvaryuḥ̍ susaBEyO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅścatUrAtrEṇa̍ yajata̍ A&sya# catvArO# vIrA jAyantE̍ suhOtA̍ sU̱dgAtA svaddhvaryuḥ̍ susaBEyO̍ yE caturviṃqśAḥ̍ pavamAnA̍ brahmavarcasaM ta - [ ] 33

verses.padam: - Padam yE|udyanta ityut̍ - yantaḥ|stOmA̱ḥ|śrIḥ|sA|atri̱m|śraddhAdE̍vamiti̍# śraddhA - dEvam|yajamAnam|catvAri̍|vIryA̍ṇi|na|upEti̍|anamann|tEja̍ḥ|indriyam|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma-varcasam|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|saḥ|EtAn|caturaḥ|catu̍ṣṭOmAniti̍ catuḥ̍ - stOmAnn|sOmAn|apaśyat|tAn|Eti̍|aharat|taiḥ|ayajata|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|prathamEna̍|avEti̍|arundha|indriyam|dvitIyE̍na|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|tRutIyEna|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ -adya̱m|caturthEna|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|catura̍ḥ|catu̍ṣṭOmAniti̍ catuḥ̍ - stOmAn|sOmAn|AharatItyA̱̍ - harati|taiḥ|yaja̍tE|tEja̍ḥ|Eva̍ ( )|prathamEna|avEti̍|rundhE|indriyam|dvitIyE̍na|brahmavarcasamiti̍# brahma - varcasam|tRutIyEna|annAdyamitya̍nna̍ - adya̱m|caturthEna|yAm|Eva|atri̍ḥ|Ruddhi̱m|Ad^^rdhnO̱t|tAm|Eva|yaja̍mAnaḥ|RuddhnOti||34̍ (68)
verses.samhita: - dya udyantaḥ stOmAḥ śrIḥ sA &triṅ# śraddhAdEvaM̍ ~MyajamAnaM̍ catvAri# vIryAṇi̍ nOpA&naman̍ tEja# indriyaM brahmavarcasa-mannAdyaṃq̍ sa EtAṅścaturaścatuṣṭOmAnth̍ sOmAna-paśyat̍ tAnA&harat̍ tairayajata̍ tEja# Eva prathamEnA̍ &vArundhEndriyaM̍ dvitIyEna̍ brahmavarcasaM tRutIyEnAnnAdya̍M̍ caturthEna ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅścaturaścatuṣṭOmAnth̍ sOmAnAhara̍ti̍ tairyajatE̍ tEja# Eva ( ) prathamEnAva̍# rundha indriyaM dvitIyEna̍ brahmavarcasaM tRutIyEnA&nnAdya̍M̍ caturthEna yAmEvAtrirq. RuddhimArddhnOt tAmEva yajamAna̍ RuddhnOti||34

verses.padam: - Padam jamadagniḥ|puṣṭi̍kAma̍ iti puṣṭi# - kAmaḥ|catUrAtrEṇEti# catuḥ - rAtrEṇa|ayajata|saḥ|EtAn|pOṣAn̍|apuṣyat|tasmA̱t|palitau|jAma̍dagniyau|na|samiti̍|jAnAtE̍ iti|EtAn|Eva|pOṣAn̍|puṣyati|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|catUrAtrEṇEti̍# catuḥ - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|purOḍAśinya̍ḥ|upasada̍ ityupa̍ - sadaḥ|Bavanti|paśava̍ḥ|vai|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|anna̱m|vai|purOḍAśa̍ḥ|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|catUrAtrEṇEti# catuḥ-rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE||35̍ (48) (jamadagni̍ - raṣṭAcatvAriṃśat)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: jamadagniḥ̍ puṣṭikAma-ścatUrAtrEṇA̍-yajata̍ sa EtAn pOṣAṃ# apuṣyat tasmA̱t palitau jAmadagniyau̍ na saM jAnAtE̍ EtAnEva pOṣA̱n puṣyati ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅścatUrAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ purOḍAśinya# upasadO# Bavanti paśavO vai purOḍAśa̍ḥ̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE &nnaM ~Mvai purOḍAśO&nna̍mEvAva̍# rundhE &nnAdaḥ paśumAn̍ Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅścatUrAtrEṇa̍ yajatE||35̍ (jamadagni̍ - raṣṭAcatvAriṃśat)̍

verses.padam: - Padam saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|idam|Ekaḥ|AsIt|saḥ|akAmayata|RutUn|sRujEya|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|pa~jcarAtramiti̍# pa~jca - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|RutUn|asRujata|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|pa~jcarAtrEṇEti̍# pa~jca - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|tE|Rutava̍ḥ|sRuṣṭAḥ|na|vyAva̍rtantEti̍# vi - Avartanta|tE|Etam|pa~jcarAtramiti̍# pa~jca - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|vyAva̍rtantEti̍# vi - Avartanta|36̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saM~MvathsarO vA idamEka# AsIth sO&kAmayatartUnth̍ sRujEyEti̍ sa EtaM pa~jcarAtrama̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sa RutUnasRujata̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn pa~jcarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ praiva jAyatE̍ ta Rutavaḥ̍ sRuṣṭA na vyAvartanta̍ ta EtaM pa~jcarAtrama̍paśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai tE vyAvartanta-[̍ ] 36

verses.padam: - Padam yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|pa~jcarAtrEṇEti# pa~jca-rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|vIti̍|pApmanA̱|BrAtRu̍vyEṇa|Eti̍|vartatE|sArva̍sEniriti̍ sArva# - sEniḥ|śaucEyaḥ|akAmayata|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|syAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|pa~jcarAtramiti̍# pa~jca - rAtram|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|sahasra̱m|paśUn|prEti̍|ApnOt|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|pa~jcarAtrEṇEti̍# pa~jca-rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|prEti̍|sahasra̱m|paśUn|ApnOti|babaraḥ|prAvA̍haṇiḥ|akAmayata|vAcaḥ|pravaditEti̍# pra - vaditA|syAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|pa~jcarAtramiti̍# pa~jca - rAtram|Eti|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ya EvaM ~MvidvAn pa~jcarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ vi pApmanA BrAtRuvyEṇA&&*̍ vartatE̍ sArvasEniḥ̍ śaucEyO&kAmayata̍ paśumAnth syAmiti sa EtaM pa~jcarAtramA&ha̍rat̍ tEnA&yajata̍ tatO vai sa sahasraM̍ paśUn prA&&*pnOdya EvaM ~MvidvAn pa~jcarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ pra sahasraM̍ paśUnA̱pnOti babaraḥ prAvAhaṇi-rakAmayata̍ vAcaḥ pravaditA̍ syAmiti sa EtaM pa~jcarAtramA̍ - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam aharat|tEna|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|vAcaḥ|pravaditEti̍# pra - vaditA|aBavat|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|pa~jcarAtrEṇEti# pa~jca - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|pravaditEti̍# pra - vaditA|Eva|vAcaḥ|Bavati|athO iti|Enam|vAcaḥ|pati̍ḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|anA̱ptaḥ|catUrAtra̍ iti# catuḥ - rAtraḥ|atirikta̍ ityati# - riktaḥ|ṣaḍrAtra iti# ṣaṭ - rAtraḥ|atha|vai|Eṣaḥ|sapraMqtIti̍# saM - prati|yajñaḥ|yat|pa~jcarAtra iti# pa~jca - rAtraḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|pa~jcarAtrEṇEti# pa~jca - rAtrEṇa|yaja̍tE|sampratIti̍# saM - prati|Eva|yajñEna|yajatE|pa~jcarAtra̍ iti# pa~jca - rAtraḥ|Bavati|pa~jca|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|38 (50)
verses.samhita: &harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sa vAcaḥ pravaditA&Ba̍vadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAn pa~jcarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ pravaditaiva vAcO BavatyathO̍# EnaM ~MvAcaspati-rityAhuranA̱pta-ścatUrAtrO&ti̍riktaḥ̍ ṣaḍ-rAtrO&tha vA Eṣa sapraMqti̍ yajñO yat pa~jcarAtrO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAn pa~jcarAtrEṇa̍ yajatE̍ saMpratyEva̍ yajñEna# yajatE pa~jcarAtrO Bavati̍ pa~jca vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam Rutuṣu|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athO̍ iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|trivRuditi̍# tri - vRut|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|Bavati|tEjaḥ|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jcadaśa̍ iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|Bavati|indriyam|Eva|avEti|rundhE|saptadaśa̍ iti# sapta - daśaḥ|Bavati|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|athO iti|prEti̍|Eva|tEna̍|jAyatE|pa~jcaviṃqśa̍ iti# pa~jca - viṃqśaḥ|agniṣṭOma ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|Bavati|prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|Aptyai̱|mahAvratavAniti# mahAvrata-vAn|annAdyasyEtyanna̍ - adyasya|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava# - ruddhyai|viśvajiditi# viśva - jit|sarvapRuṣṭha̍ iti sarva# - pRuṣṭhaḥ|atirAtra ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|sarvasya|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi-jityai ( )||39 (50)
verses.samhita: RutuṣvEva saM~MvathsarE̍ prati# tiṣṭhatyathO pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE trivRudagniṣṭOmO̍ Bavati̍ tEja# EvAva# rundhE pa~jcadaśO BavatIndriyamEvAva̍# rundhE saptadaśO BavatyannAdyasyA-va̍ruddhyA̍ athO praiva tEna# jAyatE pa~jcaviṃqśO̱ &gniṣṭOmO Bavati̍ prajApatErAptyai̍# mahAvratavA-nannAdyasyA-va̍ruddhyai̍ viśvajith sarvapRuṣṭhO-&tirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ sarvasyABiji̍tyai̍ ( )||39

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu - ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|Eti|dadE|imAm|agRuBṇann|raśanAm|Rutasya̍|pUrvE̱|Ayu̍ṣi|vidathE̍ṣu|kavyA||tayA̱|dEvAḥ|sutam|Eti̍|baBUvuḥ|Rutasya̍|sAmann̍|saram|ArapantItyA̱̍ - rapantI||aBidhA̍ ityaBi̍ - dhAḥ|asi|Buvanam|asi|yantA|asi|dhartA|asi|saḥ|agnim|vaiśvAnaram|sapra̍thasamiti̍ sa - prathasam|gacCa|svAhAkRuta̍ iti svAhA̱ - kRutaḥ|pRuthivyAm|yantA|rAṭ|yantA|asi|yamanaḥ|dhartA|asi|dharuṇa̍ḥ̍ ( )|kRuṣyai|tvA|kṣEmAya|tvA|rayyai|tvA|pOṣA̍ya|tvA|pRuthivyai|tvA|antari̍kṣAya|tvA|divE|tvA|satE|tvA|asa̍tE|tvA|adBya̍ ityat̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|OṣadhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|tvA|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|BUtEByaḥ||40̍ (75) (dharuṇaḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: dEvasyatvA̍ savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱rbAhuByA̱M̍ pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmA dada̍ imAmagRuBṇan̍ raśanAmRutasya pUrva Ayuṣi̍ vidathEṣu̍ kavyA|tayA# dEvAḥ sutamA baBUvur̍ Rutasya sAmantha̱-saramArapantI||aBidhA̍ asi̍ Buvanamasi̍ yantA&si# dhartA&si sO̱&gniM ~Mvai̱śvAnaraṃ saprathasaM̍ gacCa svAhAkRutaḥ̍ pRuthivyAM ~MyantA rAḍ yantA&si yamanO̍ dhartA&si# dharuṇaḥ̍ ( ) kRuṣyai tvA kṣEmAya̍ tvA rayyai tvA pOṣAya̍ tvA pRuthivyai tvA &ntarikṣAya̍ tvA divE tvA# satE tvA&satE̍ tvAdByastvau-ṣadhIByastvA̍ viśvE̱ByastvA BUtEByaḥ||40̍ (dharuṇaḥ - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam viBUriti# vi - BUḥ|mAtrA|praBUriti# pra - BUḥ|pitrA|aśvaḥ|asi|haya̍ḥ|asi|atya̍ḥ|asi|nara̍ḥ|asi|arvA̱|asi|sapti̍ḥ|asi|vAjI|asi|vRuṣA̱|asi|nRumaṇA̍ iti# nRu - manA̱ḥ|asi|yayuḥ|nAma̍|asi|AdityAnA̱m|patva̍|anviti̍|ihi|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|svAhA̱|indrAgniByAmitI̱ndrAgni̍ - ByAm|svAhA̱|prajApataya̍ iti# prajA - patayE|svAhA̱|viśvE̱Byaḥ|dEvEByaḥ|svAhA̱|sarvA̱Byaḥ|dEvEtA̱Byaḥ|iha|dhRuti̍ḥ|svAhA̱|iha|vidhRu̍tiriti̍ vi - dhRutiḥ|svAhA̱|iha|rantiḥ|svAhA̱̍ ( )|iha|ramatiḥ|svAhA̱|BUḥ|asi|BuvE|tvA|BavyA̍ya|tvA|BaviṣyatE|tvA|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|BUtEBya̍ḥ|dEvA̱ḥ|AśApAlA̍ ityAśA̍ - pAlAḥ|Etam|dEvEByaḥ|aśva̱m|mEdhA̍ya|prOkṣi̍tamiti̍ pra - ukṣitam|gOpAyata||41 (72) (rantiḥ svAhA - dvAviṃśatiśca]̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: viBUrmAtrA praBUḥ pitrAśvO&si̍ hayO&syatyO&si̍ narO&syarvA&si̍ saptirasi̍ vAjyasi̍ vRuṣA&si̍ nRumaṇA# asi yayurnAmA̱syAdityAnAM patvAnvihyagnayE̍ svAhA svAhE̱ndrAgniByAṅq svAhA̱ prajApatayE̍ svAhA viśvE̱ByO dEvEByaḥ svAhA sarvA̱ByO dEvEtA̱Bya iha dhRutiḥ svAhEha vidhRutiḥ̍ svAhEha rantiḥ svAhE ( ) -ha ramatiḥ̍ svAhA BUrasi̍ BuvE tvA BavyAya̍ tvA BaviṣyatE tvA viśvE̱ByastvA BUtEByO dEvA# AśApAlA EtaM dEvEByO&śvaM mEdhAya̍ prOkṣitaM̍ gOpAyata||41 (rantiḥ svAhA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam AyanAyEtyA̱̍ - ayanAya|svAhA̱|prAya̍ṇAyEti̍# pra - ayanAya|svAhA̱|uddrAvAyEtyu̍t̍ - drAvAya|svAhA̱|uddru̍tAyEtyut-drutAya|svAhA̱|śUkArAyEti̍# śU-kArAya|svAhA̱|śUkRu̍tAyEti̍ śU-kRutAya|svAhA̱|palAyitAya|svAhA̱|ApalA̍yitAyEtyA̱̍ - palAyitAya|svAhA̱|Avalga̍ta̍ ityA̱ - valgatE|svAhA̱|parAvalga̍ta̍ iti# parA - valgatE|svAhA̱|Ayata̍ ityA̱ - yatE|svAhA̱|prayata iti# pra - yatE|svAhA̱|sarvasmai|svAhA̱||42̍ (26) (AyanAyOtta̍ramApalA̍yitAya̍ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: AyanAya̍ svAhA prAyaṇAya̍ svAhO̱ddrAvAya svAhOddrutAya̍ svAhA# śUkArAya svAhA śUkRutAya̍ svAhA palAyitAya̍ svAhA &&palAyitAya̍ svAhA &&valgatE̍ svAhA# parAvalgatE̍ svAhA# &&yatE svAhA̱ prayatE svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||42 (AyanAyOtta̍ramApalA̍yitAya̍ ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnayE̱|svAhA̱|sOmAya|svAhA̱|vAyavE̱|svAhA̱|apAm|mOdA̍ya|svAhA̱|savitrE|svAhA̱|sara̍svatyai|svAhA̱|indrA̍ya|svAhA̱|bRuhaspata̍yE|svAhA̱|mitrAya̍|svAhA̱|varu̍ṇAya|svAhA̱|sarva̍smai|svAhA̱||43̍ (23) (agnayE# vAyavE&pAM mOdAyEndrAya̍ trayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A14)
